text:
Adobe launches camera app for iPhone to enhance photos
04 Nov 2019, 20:13 by Ilya Sidorov
Adobe introduced Photoshop Camera with augmented reality support. The app will appear on the App Store in 2020.
Photoshop Camera can automatically detect objects in a photo and select suitable filters. Preset effects will be created by professional artists, but users will be able to modify them.






Adobe is launching a free AI-powered Photoshop Camera app Artists can create filters using layered PSDs www.theverge.com
